basics.name: Abdul Aziz Marifudin
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: I’m passionate about the latest in computer technology and enjoy exploring new developments. As a skilled problem solver, I have experience diagnosing and resolving NIC errors and managing Linux OS issues. I also successfully handled a challenging VMware installation problem in an isolated environment that lasted over two weeks, even after escalation to VMware support.

work.name: PT.Sinergi Merah Putih
work.summary: Building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins to streamline application deployment. I also deploy and manage infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible, ensuring reliable and scalable environments. Additionally, I monitor both applications and infrastructure performance using Grafana to ensure optimal operation and uptime.
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Develop and manage CI/CD pipelines for both development and production environments.
Manage virtual machines (VMs) by deploying, updating specifications, deleting VMs using Terraform, VMware ESXi, or vCenter, and maintaining VMs from installation to application deployment.
Dockerize applications based on Node.js to streamline development and deployment processes.
Deploy applications on cloud platforms such as AWS and GCP, ensuring efficient and scalable infrastructure.
Identify and resolve hardware issues on bare metal servers, ensuring optimal performance and minimizing downtime.
Create simple bash scripts to automate tasks and improve system management.
achievements: Collaborated with development teams to successfully deploy and maintain CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless integration and continuous delivery of applications.

work.name: PT.Multikarya Sarana Perkasa
work.summary: Provided essential administrative support to ensure smooth office operations. My responsibilities included assisting with daily office tasks, managing general administrative duties, and preparing regularly scheduled reports.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Providing administrative support to ensure efficient operation of the office.
Assisting in daily office needs and managing general administrative activities.
Assisting in the preparation of regularly scheduled reports.
achievements: Secured Permits for Construction Workers: Successfully ensured that all necessary permits for workers were obtained from area owners, facilitating smooth operations as a construction vendor.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that provides weather information for any location.
highlights: Built with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: An online store built with Next.js and Stripe for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality
